content.webTitle: University guide 2019: Heythrop College, University of London

fields.headline: University guide 2019: Heythrop College, University of London
fields.bodyText: Heythrop is now closed. There is no plan for the move of any departments or a continuation of Heythrop College anywhere else. Heythrop was one of 19 colleges of the University of London, and specialised in philosophy and theology since 1614.
